item.title: Toradora! – Episode 13
item.content:encoded: Can human beings truly come to understand each other? Can we untangle ourselves from the bitter biases of our own hearts, applying only what insight might be considered “universal” to our judgment of another’s feelings? And what is truly “universal,” … Continue reading →
